text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 18 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Augustine Choge ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Bado Worku ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tariku Bekele ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 5000 metres
